Class ExceptionTranslationRoute

java.lang.Object

                  org.cleverbus.core.common.asynch.ExceptionTranslationRoute
All Implemented Interfaces:
org.apache.camel.RoutesBuilder, Aware, ApplicationContextAware
@CamelConfiguration(value="exTranslatorRouteBean")
public class ExceptionTranslationRoute
extends AbstractBasicRoute

Route definition that defines route for exception translation. See ExceptionTranslator for more details.

Author:
Petr Juza
